name: millennial
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
relating to a millennium or to the year 2000: millennial celebrations In the millennial year, millions of pilgrims flocked to Rome.
born between around 1981 and 1996: the millennial generation The 1900 newborn would have been fortunate to know their grandparents but some millenial children were cradled by their great-great-grandparents. Compare
Generation Z
